plugins.name: Gravity Themer
plugins.description:
Plugin allows you to effortlessly apply custom themes from Gravity UI Themer to your Figma designs.


Design your perfect theme using the Gravity UI Themer — choose your own colors, typography, and border radius. Then import your theme into Figma and instantly apply all the variables to components from the Gravity UI Figma library.

plugins.name: StyleX - All-in-one Style management
plugins.description:
**Style Organizer by Squidx** helps you scan, analyze, and clean up your color styles in seconds.


✨ Instantly view every color used on the page

🎨 See usage count, link status, and style name

🔗 Merge unlinked fills into existing styles or auto-create new ones

🌈 Group colors into primary, secondary, shades, and alpha channels

⚡ One-click auto-merge for everything at once


Perfect for design system maintainers, freelancers, and plugin nerds who want clean, linked, and scalable color usage.

accepted.name: Saber Ali
accepted.description: Hi, 👋 I’m Saber Ali. A Product Designer and Visual Developer from Bangladesh. I specialize in UI/UX Design, Responsive Web Design, and Visual Development

plugins.tagline: Quickly view, merge & organize all color styles in one place.

plugins.name: Icon Scaler
plugins.description:
ICON SCALER :

This plugin lets you scale one or multiple selected icons into multiple standard sizes in a single click — while preserving all their styles, groups, layers, strokes, and fills. No flattening. No distortion.


But that’s not all — It also automatically generates a variable component for each icon, so you can easily manage different icon sizes using Figma's powerful component properties.


Whether you’re preparing icon sets for design systems, exports, or different platform needs, this plugin automates the repetitive work — and gives you perfect consistency every time.


KEY FEATURES:

✅ Scale multiple icons at once into multiple sizes

✅ Preserves structure — no flattening or vector merging

✅ Creates a variable component with size modes for each icon

✅ UI with smart “chip-style” size selection + custom size support

✅ Neatly arranged output inside a new frame, ready to use or export
plugins.tagline: Create Icon Size Range and components instantly

134540.name: Icon Scaler
134540.description:
ICON SCALER :

This plugin lets you scale one or multiple selected icons into multiple standard sizes in a single click — while preserving all their styles, groups, layers, strokes, and fills. No flattening. No distortion.


But that’s not all — It also automatically generates a variable component for each icon, so you can easily manage different icon sizes using Figma's powerful component properties.


Whether you’re preparing icon sets for design systems, exports, or different platform needs, this plugin automates the repetitive work — and gives you perfect consistency every time.


KEY FEATURES:

✅ Scale multiple icons at once into multiple sizes

✅ Preserves structure — no flattening or vector merging

✅ Creates a variable component with size modes for each icon

✅ UI with smart “chip-style” size selection + custom size support

✅ Neatly arranged output inside a new frame, ready to use or export
134540.tagline: Create Icon Size Range and components instantly

plugins.name: Variables 2 Table
plugins.description:
Variables 2 Table is a Figma plugin that turns all your variables—including numbers, colors, strings, and booleans—into a well-structured table directly on the canvas.

It clearly displays modes, types, and alias relationships, making it perfect for managing complex design systems and supporting design reviews and documentation.
plugins.tagline: Visualize all Figma variables in a structured table format.

135368.name: Variables 2 Table
135368.description:

It clearly displays modes, types, and alias relationships, making it perfect for managing complex design systems and supporting design reviews and documentation.
135368.tagline: Visualize all Figma variables in a structured table format.

plugins.name: Thai Spell Checker - พ่อขุนเช็ก (AI Powered) - Beta
plugins.description:
🏰 พ่อขุนเช็ก - ตัวช่วยเช็กภาษาไทยสุดแม่น ที่ทำให้การทำงานง่าย สนุก และดูโปรฯ กว่าเดิม!


✨ จุดเด่นของพ่อขุนเช็ก

* เช็กภาษาไทยแม่นยำระดับโปร : ใช้ AI ตรวจสอบการสะกดและบริบทไทยแบบละเอียด ครบทุกจุด

* สรุปผลไว สนุก และเข้าใจง่าย : ระบบให้คะแนนพร้อมแนะนำแบบเข้าใจง่าย สนุก เหมือนมีพ่อขุนรามคำแหงมาคอยติวส่วนตัว

* ใช้งานง่ายในคลิกเดียว : เลือกเฟรม/ข้อความ แล้วคลิกเดียวจบ ไม่ต้องเสียเวลาย้ายแพลตฟอร์ม

* ประหยัดเวลาทำงานจริง : ไม่ต้องเช็กทีละคำ ตรวจจบในรอบเดียว พร้อมใช้งานทันที


🎯 เหมาะกับใคร

* UX Writer สาย Copy ไทย

* ทีม Marketing ที่สร้าง Content ไทย

* Designer/ทีม Product ที่ต้องการงานไทยไร้ที่ติใน Figma


🚀 เริ่มใช้งานง่ายสุด ๆ

1. เลือกข้อความที่ต้องการเช็ก

2. เปิด Plugin “Thai Spell Checker - พ่อขุนเช็ก (AI Powered)” ใน Figma

3. รับผลตรวจและคำแนะนำทันที! ทำให้การเช็กภาษาไทยไม่ใช่เรื่องน่าเบื่ออีกต่อไป


เพียงคลิกเดียว งานภาษาไทยของคุณจะไร้ที่ติ ดูมืออาชีพ และประหยัดเวลากว่าที่เคย!
plugins.tagline: เช็คการสะกดภาษาไทยด้วย AI แบบสนุกๆ สไตล์พ่อขุนรามคำแหง พร้อมให้คะแนนแบบโบราณ

plugins.name: BorderBuddy
plugins.description:
Quickly inspect and update border radius values across selected frames in Figma.

BorderBuddy helps you speed up your workflow by displaying the current border radius of elements inside a selected frame, allowing you to adjust all values at once with a single click. Perfect for cleaning up inconsistent UI or testing design variations.
plugins.tagline: Quickly view and update the border radius of all elements within a selected frame in Figma.

133137.name: BorderBuddy
133137.description:
Quickly inspect and update border radius values across selected frames in Figma.

BorderBuddy helps you speed up your workflow by displaying the current border radius of elements inside a selected frame, allowing you to adjust all values at once with a single click. Perfect for cleaning up inconsistent UI or testing design variations.
133137.tagline: Quickly view and update the border radius of all elements within a selected frame in Figma.

plugins.name: STAR Method for Figma
plugins.description:
STAR Method for Figma

Struggling to explain your design process in interviews? The STAR Method for Figma helps you:


Features:

✨ Structure case studies with {Situation - Task - Action - Result},

✨ Link stories directly to your Figma frames,

✨ Practice answering behavioral questions,

✨ Export snippets for portfolios & interviews.


How to use:

1. Open any Figma project

2. Fill in STAR sections

3. Copy your interview-ready story!


Open it in your Case Study to try Now!
plugins.tagline: Transform your designs into interview-winning stories.

plugins.name: MoveQuack
plugins.description:
Feature Overview

This plugin allows users to set customizable timers for both work and break periods, catering to individual needs.


Key Features

Customizable Timer: Set specific times for work and rest, with full flexibility.

Timed Reminders: Automatically alerts users when it's time to take a break, preventing overwork.

Boost Efficiency and Health: Helps maintain high productivity while ensuring overall well-being.


Use Cases

Perfect for users who engage in long work or study sessions, especially for professionals like designers and developers who need regular breaks.
plugins.tagline: Break Reminder Timer

115542.description:

plugins.name: Figma2mos.
plugins.description:
Translate your mobile Figma designs into an executable layout for the Mobility Suite (mos.). Mobile frames created in Figma can be translated in their entirety, and individual Figma elements can be edited to suit mos. In addition, ready-made templates can be created for individual mos.-layers and used in the Figma editor to build your design. You can find a Quick Start Guide and Test Designs in the attached Playground-File.

For more information about mos. visit: https://mobilitysuite.de/
plugins.tagline: Create, translate, and edit mobile Figma designs to export an executable layout for mos.

105007.name: Figma2mos.
105007.description:
Translate your mobile Figma designs into an executable layout for the Mobility Suite (mos.). Mobile frames created in Figma can be translated in their entirety, and individual Figma elements can be edited to suit mos. In addition, ready-made templates can be created for individual mos.-layers and used in the Figma editor to build your design. You can find a Quick Start Guide and Test Designs in the attached Playground-File.

For more information about mos. visit: https://mobilitysuite.de/
105007.tagline: Create, translate, and edit mobile Figma designs to export an executable layout for mos.

plugins.name: OxyReIcon
plugins.description:
OxyReIcon is the ultimate Figma plugin for designers and icon creators who want to streamline their workflow and create consistent, professional-looking icon sets effortlessly.


Key Features:

  1. Instantly create frames around your vector icons
  2. Customize background and icon colors with opacity control
  3. Automatically align icons in a customizable grid layout
  4. Resize icons and frames with precise control
  5. Convert framed icons back to vectors with a single click
  6. Save and load your preferred settings for quick access


Whether you're creating a comprehensive icon library, designing a cohesive UI, or preparing assets for development handoff, OxyReIcon has got you covered. Say goodbye to manual resizing and positioning – let our plugin do the heavy lifting so you can focus on what matters most: designing great icons.
plugins.tagline: Transform your vector icons into perfectly styled, grid-aligned frames in seconds.

103926.name: OxyReIcon
103926.description:
OxyReIcon is the ultimate Figma plugin for designers and icon creators who want to streamline their workflow and create consistent, professional-looking icon sets effortlessly.


Key Features:

  1. Instantly create frames around your vector icons
  2. Customize background and icon colors with opacity control
  3. Automatically align icons in a customizable grid layout
  4. Resize icons and frames with precise control
  5. Convert framed icons back to vectors with a single click
  6. Save and load your preferred settings for quick access


Whether you're creating a comprehensive icon library, designing a cohesive UI, or preparing assets for development handoff, OxyReIcon has got you covered. Say goodbye to manual resizing and positioning – let our plugin do the heavy lifting so you can focus on what matters most: designing great icons.
103926.tagline: Transform your vector icons into perfectly styled, grid-aligned frames in seconds.

plugins.name: Multiclip
plugins.description:
✨ What's New in v1.0

✅ Copy multiple text elements anywhere in Figma.

✅ Select entire sections or frames to copy all text elements at once.

✅ Saved items remain available even after closing the plugin.

✅ Copy previous text to clipboard when replacing.

✅ Quickly paste saved text into selected text layers or create a new text node if none is selected.

✅ Easily remove all stored items when needed.

✅ A clean and simple interface for managing copied text efficiently.


🛠 How It Works

✅ Select text layers and click "Copy" to add them to your clipboard.

✅ Manage clipboard history (up to 10 items).

plugins.name: snapInsert
plugins.description:
snapInsert is a powerful Figma plugin designed to streamline the process of searching filtering and adding component instances into your designs.

Perfect for designers and teams who work with large design systems, Component Filter helps you save time and maintain focus on your design tasks.


Key Features:

• Component Set Filtering: Easily filter components by their set names to focus on specific groups within your design system.

• Dynamic Key-Value Filtering: Use key-value pairs to narrow down your search and find exactly what you need based on component properties like size, orientation, or any custom attributes.

• Real-Time Results: As you apply filters, see immediate updates to the component list, ensuring you always have the most relevant components in view.

• Intuitive UI: The plugin features a clean, user-friendly interface that integrates seamlessly with Figma, making it easy to apply filters and manage your components.


Note:

Currently, Component Filter only searches for components within the file you are working on. In future releases, users will be able to search components from published design libraries, expanding the plugin's functionality to cover broader design systems.
plugins.tagline: Effortlessly search and insert component instances from sets or singles into your designs.

  1. レイヤー名の設定：テキストを入力したいレイヤーに、共通の名前をつけます。
  2. テキストの準備：流し込みたいテキストを、改行で区切って準備します。
  3. 対象オブジェクトの選択：プラグインを起動し、テキストを適用したいグループやコンポーネントを選びます。
  4. 入力と適用：レイヤー名とテキストを入力して、「適用」ボタンをクリックします。

plugins.name: Figma to Unity Exporter
plugins.description:
### Tired of manually recreating your Figma designs in Unity?


Figma To Unity Importer is the ultimate workflow solution designed to bridge the gap between designers and developers. Stop wasting hours meticulously rebuilding UI and start converting your high-fidelity Figma designs into fully functional, native Unity uGUI components with just a few clicks.


**⚠️ IMPORTANT: This is one half of a powerful 2-part system.**

This Figma plugin exports your design data. To bring your designs to life in Unity, you need the professional importer asset from the Unity Asset Store.


---


### **➡️ Step 1: Get the Professional Unity Importer Asset**


To complete the workflow, please purchase and import the required companion asset from the Unity Asset Store. It's the engine that powers the entire import process in Unity, packed with advanced features to ensure a perfect conversion.


**[>> Get "Figma To Unity Importer" on the Unity Asset Store ($15) <<](https://assetstore.unity.com/preview/323342/1075296)**


---


### **✨ Key Features:**


* **Accurate Conversion:** Preserves layer hierarchy, names, positions, sizes, and rotations.

* **Advanced Text Support:** Exports text as TextMeshPro components, maintaining font family, **font weight (including variable fonts)**, size, and color.

* **Image Export:** Automatically exports image fills and creates native Unity `Image` components.

* **Resolution Scaling:** Scale your entire UI to different screen sizes automatically.

* **Smart & Simple UI:** Remembers your last used settings and supports multiple languages.


### **🚀 Workflow:**


**1. In Unity (Setup):**

* Purchase and import the importer from the Asset Store using the link above.

* Install the required packages as described in the asset's documentation (TextMeshPro, UI, Newtonsoft.Json).


**2. In Figma (Export):**

* Run this plugin.

* Select the single, top-level Frame you want to export.

* Configure your options (target resolution, include images, etc.).

* Click "Export" to download the `.zip` file.


**3. In Unity (Import):**

* Unzip the downloaded file.

* Drag the `FigmaExport` folder into your Unity `Assets`.

* Open the importer via `Tools > Figma Importer`.

* Assign the `hierarchy.json` file and click "Create UI".


That's it! Your design is now a native, ready-to-use UI in Unity.
plugins.tagline: The ultimate workflow bridge. Go from Figma design to a working Unity UI in minutes.

plugins.name: Typographica
plugins.description:
Typographica helps you quickly create beautiful and balanced font combinations for any project — from corporate dashboards to creative websites.


The plugin analyzes your chosen primary font, project style, and font metrics to generate harmonious font pairs automatically.


What does Typographica do?


  1. Generates Primary + Secondary + Accent font combinations
  2. Takes into account your project style (7 styles: business, corporate, modern, elegant, fun, personal, minimalist)
  3. Analyzes font metrics (x-height, glyph width, weight, stylistic characteristics)
  4. Automatically filters out fonts that do not fit the selected style
  5. Lets you save combinations as Figma text styles and variables
  6. Optionally adds smart descriptions to generated styles
  7. Supports manual swapping of secondary and accent fonts
  8. Works with any available fonts — Google Fonts, local fonts, and Figma-supported fonts


Who is it for?


  1. Product designers — to quickly build solid typography systems
  2. UX/UI designers — to improve readability and visual rhythm
  3. Brand designers — to find well-balanced and creative font pairs
  4. Beginners — to get guidance on what fonts work well together
  5. Experienced designers — to save time and explore unexpected combinations


How does it work?


  1. Choose your project style
  2. Select a Primary Font
  3. Click Change Pairs
  4. Browse the generated font pairs and accent options
  5. Save styles or variables in one click
  6. Tweak and refine as needed


Why use Typographica?


Save time — no more manual font pairing

Get better quality — pairs are based on font metrics and style fit, not guesswork

Flexible — works for classic and modern designs alike

Customizable — easy to adjust pairs or generate new ones on the fly


Styles and Tokens Support


Typographica not only generates font pairs, but also helps you create full-fledged text styles and design tokens in Figma.


You can save your Primary, Secondary, and Accent fonts as reusable Text Styles and optionally as Variables (Tokens) — making your typography consistent across your project and design system.


Style Description Table


Typographica can automatically generate a style description table for your font system — right inside Figma.


It creates a clear, editable table summarizing your Primary, Secondary, and Accent fonts, with suggested usage and style notes.


Perfect for documenting typography choices or sharing with your team and developers.


Typographica is your smart font pairing assistant in Figma. Make your typography cleaner, more beautiful, and more consistent — with less effort.

accepted.name: Andrei Kuznetsov
accepted.description: Templates, UI Kits, Design Systems, Plugins

plugins.tagline: Smart Font Pair Generator for Figma

plugins.name: Validator
plugins.description: Validator is a tool to verify that all elements in your design correctly use defined design tokens. It helps maintain visual consistency by quickly identifying non-compliant elements, invalid properties, and suggesting corrections to ensure adherence to your design system. Supports validation of colors, spacing, typography, and components with Figma variables.
plugins.tagline: Validate design tokens and ensure design system consistency

plugins.name: Version Linker
plugins.description:
Version Linker - Link and Manage Component Versions


A powerful version management plugin for Figma that helps you link and track different versions of your components across frames.


Key Features:

• Create Main Version Links (MVL) to establish version control points

• Add Secondary Version Links (SVL) to connect related components

• Navigate instantly between linked components

• Add descriptions to track changes and updates

• Customize version colors for better visual organization

• Manage versions with easy-to-use edit and delete functions


Perfect for:

• Design systems with multiple component versions

• Teams tracking component evolution

• Projects requiring version history

• Maintaining component relationships across frames


How it works:

1. Create an MVL with a version number and color

2. Add SVLs to connect related components in different frames

3. Add descriptions to document changes

4. Use the navigation buttons to quickly move between linked components


Stay organized and maintain clear version relationships in your Figma files with Version Linker.
plugins.tagline: managing version

plugins.name: SafeToSell - Trademark checker
plugins.description:
SafeToSell helps digital product creators, print-on-demand sellers, and e-commerce designers automatically scan their designs for active trademarks and forbidden keywords.


Simply select text elements from your Figma frame, and the plugin will instantly validate if they’re safe to sell on popular platforms like Etsy, Shopify, Printify, and more.


---


✅ Instant trademark scan

✅ Detect banned phrases before you publish

✅ Avoid copyright strikes, takedowns, or store bans

✅ Built for POD, digital goods, and e-commerce sellers


---


Whether you're designing T-shirts, wall art, digital downloads, or listing mockups, SafeToSell gives you peace of mind that your text won’t get flagged or removed.


Don’t risk losing your store — scan it before you sell it.
plugins.tagline: Instantly check your designs for trademarks and banned phrases before uploading.

plugins.name: Lehuye
plugins.description:
简介：

这款多功能插件专为设计师和开发者设计，旨在简化文本管理和矢量图形处理流程。通过提供一系列强大的文本操作功能，如一键提取、批量替换、精准筛选和灵活插入等，极大地提高了工作效率。此外，它还支持快速导出SVG代码及自动捕获当前窗口标题信息，使得项目整理更加便捷。


This versatile plugin is designed for designers and developers to simplify text management and vector graphics processing workflows. By providing a suite of powerful text manipulation features such as one-click extraction, batch replacement, precise filtering, and flexible insertion, it significantly boosts productivity. Additionally, it supports quick export of SVG code and automatic capture of the current window title information, making project organization more convenient.


このプラグインはデザイナーや開発者のためのツールで、テキスト管理とベクターグラフィックス処理を簡素化します。ワンクリックでのテキスト抽出、バッチ置換、特定の条件に基づくテキストフィルタリングなど、強力なテキスト操作機能により、作業効率が大幅に向上します。さらに、SVGコードのエクスポートや現在のウィンドウタイトル情報の自動取得もサポートしています。



功能作用说明


获取文本 / Extract Text


作用：允许用户一键提取设计中的所有文本内容，便于文案管理。


役割：デザイン内のすべてのテキストコンテンツをワンクリックで抽出でき、コピー管理を容易にします。


Function: Allows users to extract all text content in the design with one click, making copy management easier.


替换文本 / Replace Text


作用：支持批量替换文档中的指定文本，快速完成文案更新。


役割：ドキュメント内の指定されたテキストを一括で置換し、コピーの更新を迅速に完了します。


Function: Supports batch replacement of specific text in the document to quickly complete copy updates.


过滤文本 / Filter Text


作用：根据特定条件精准筛选文本，帮助用户聚焦关键内容。


役割：特定の条件に基づいてテキストを正確にフィルタリングし、ユーザーが重要なコンテンツに焦点を当てられるようにします。


Function: Precisely filters text based on specific conditions to help users focus on key content.


插入文本 / Insert Text


作用：允许灵活插入动态文本或占位符，优化设计流程。


役割：動的テキストやプレースホルダーを柔軟に挿入でき、デザインプロセスを最適化します。


Function: Allows flexible insertion of dynamic text or placeholders to optimize the design workflow.


获取 SVG 代码 / Get SVG Code


作用：快速导出矢量图形的SVG代码，便于开发使用。


役割：ベクターグラフィックスのSVGコードを迅速にエクスポートし、開発に利用しやすくします。


Function: Quickly exports SVG code for vector graphics, making it developer-friendly.


获取窗口标题 / Get Window Title


作用：自动捕获当前窗口的标题信息，方便项目整理。


役割：現在のウィンドウのタイトル情報を自動的に取得し、プロジェクト整理を便利にします。


Function: Automatically captures the current window title information, making project organization easier.
plugins.tagline: 乐乎也数字盒子

126908.name: Lehuye

plugins.name: Aphrodite CSS generator
plugins.description: Aphrodite CSS Generator replaces standard CSS output in Figma’s code generation panel with Aphrodite-compatible CSS-in-JS styles.
plugins.tagline: Generate Aphrodite CSS-in-JS styles directly from Figma designs.

127923.name: Aphrodite CSS generator
127923.description: Aphrodite CSS Generator replaces standard CSS output in Figma’s code generation panel with Aphrodite-compatible CSS-in-JS styles.
127923.tagline: Generate Aphrodite CSS-in-JS styles directly from Figma designs.

plugins.name: CoverForge
plugins.description: CoverForge is an automation tool that allows you to create fast and professional designs for your Figma projects. By entering your project information, it automatically provides special solutions, speeds up your designs and gives your projects an impressive look. Bring both time and creativity to the forefront!

accepted.name: Ayhan Fırat Fındıkoğlu
accepted.description: I'm Fırat. A digital product designer based in Turkey with 13 years of experience. My main profession is designing digital products focused on usability.

plugins.tagline: Create fast, easy and professional Figma covers!

123398.name: CoverForge
123398.description: CoverForge is an automation tool that allows you to create fast and professional designs for your Figma projects. By entering your project information, it automatically provides special solutions, speeds up your designs and gives your projects an impressive look. Bring both time and creativity to the forefront!
123398.release_notes: Bug fix was made, UI adjustments were made in the file type selection area.
123398.tagline: Create fast, easy and professional Figma covers!

plugins.name: Postcard Generator Experiment
plugins.description:
This plugin is a study project for the Generative AI course at the Innopolis University.


It tries it's best to generate greeting cards by combining layout generation, user-uploaded photos, a custom AI-generated poem and a thematic AI-generated background.


To run, get a token at an https://openrouter.ai and place it as the only text block on an empty page.


For help feel free to write me at levada.andrew@gmail.com


Github — https://github.com/andrewlevada/postcard-generator-experiment
plugins.tagline: A study project: a couple of llm's trying their best to design
